entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
